== Description ==
Retrieve path of archive template in current or parent template. 

== Usage ==
%%%<?php get_archive_template(); ?>%%%

== Parameters ==
None.

== Return Values ==
; (string) : Returns result from [[Function_Reference/get_query_template|<tt>get_query_template('archive')</tt>]]

== Examples ==
<!-- Need creative examples. Feel free to link to external examples. -->

== Notes ==
* Uses: [[Function_Reference/get_query_template|<tt>get_query_template()</tt>]]

=== Filters ===
* Calls <b><tt>'archive_template'</tt></b> filter on found path: <br /><tt>apply_filters('archive_template', $template)</tt>

== Change Log ==
Since: 1.5.0

== Source File ==

<tt>get_archive_template()</tt> is located in {{Trac|wp-includes/template.php}}.
